A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson shook up the star wars UNIVERSE with this one and he did the right thing. This film broke the trend and formula that all star wars have come to know but A LOT of us SADLY to attached to.  with an exciting story that focuses more on the characters rather than the flashy aspect of the galaxy far far away\, The last jedi has DEFINITELY setup for an exciting conclusion to the trilogy in EPISODE 9.
